SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.lonepulse.robozombie.annotation
Annotation Type Serialize

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface Serialize

Attaches a serialize for converting models to the format consumed by endpoints.


Usage:

  1. At type-level on an endpoint definition; attaches this serializer for all requests.

    @Serialize(JSON)
@Endpoint("https://api.github.com")
public interface GitHubEndpoint {
      ...
    }

  2. At method-level on an endpoint request.

    @Serialize(JSON)
@POST("/gists")
void createGist(@Entity Gist gist);


Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.1.2

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends AbstractSerializer<?,?>> type
          The Class of a custom AbstractSerializer which should be attached.
 Entity.ContentType value
          The Entity.ContentType which identifies a pre-fabricated serializer, which is responsible for converting model to the accepted request content.
 

value

public abstract Entity.ContentType value

The Entity.ContentType which identifies a pre-fabricated serializer, which is responsible for converting model to the accepted request content.

Returns:
the Entity.ContentType which identifies an out-of-the-box serializer

Since:
1.3.0
Default:
com.lonepulse.robozombie.annotation.Entity.ContentType.UNDEFINED

type

public abstract Class<? extends AbstractSerializer<?,?>> type

The Class of a custom AbstractSerializer which should be attached.

@Serialize(type = GistSerializer.class)  @POST(path = "/gists")  @Serialize(JSON)
void createGist(@Entity Gist gist);

Returns:
the Class of the custom AbstractSerializer to be used

Since:
1.3.0
Default:
com.lonepulse.robozombie.request.PlainSerializer.class
